title: Low Priority Queue

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Hi. I am wondering why i got placed onto low priority queue even though I came back into the game 10 minutes before it was over. My computer died, but I got it working before it was over. But one other person afk. Is there anyway I can get out of the low priority queue? 
Thank you.

I was playing Garen btw.
{{champion:86}}

replies.body:
If you're marked as inactive by the [Leaverbuster System,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) you'll receive a penalty for the match. This is because regardless if you reconnect to a match, disconnecting leaves your team without a full team of 5 and negatively impacts everyone. 

Because of this, disconnections are all treated equally, and penalties cannot be removed or modified. Let me know if you have any questions.
